debates.showAs: Gender Recognition (Amendment) (Prisons) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Gender Recognition Act 2015 to make provision for single-sex accommodation in prisons; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Inscne a Aithint, 2015 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cóiríocht aonghnéis i bpríosúin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Inscne a Aithint (Leasú) (Príosúin), 2025

debates.showAs: An Bille um an Aonú Leasú is Daichead ar an mBunreacht (Cearta Vótála i dToghcháin Uachtaráin), 2025: An Chéad Chéim
Forty-first Amendment of the Constitution (Voting Rights in Presidential Elections) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú.
bill.shortTitleEn: Forty-first Amendment of the Constitution (Voting Rights in Presidential Elections) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Aonú Leasú is Daichead ar an mBunreacht (Cearta Vótála i dToghcháin Uachtaráin), 2025

debates.showAs: Education (Smartphones in Primary Schools) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to promote the welfare and education of children by prohibiting use of smartphones by students in primary schools; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur leas agus oideachas leanaí chun cinn trí thoirmeasc a chur le húsáid fón cliste ag daltaí i mbunscoileanna; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Fóin Chliste i mBunscoileanna), 2024

debates.showAs: Gender Recognition (Amendment) (Prisons) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Gender Recognition Act 2015 to make provision for single-sex accommodation in prisons; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Inscne a Aithint, 2015 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cóiríocht aonghnéis i bpríosúin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Inscne a Aithint (Leasú) (Príosúin), 2023

debates.showAs: European Convention on Human Rights (Challenge to British Government Amnesty) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the State to make an application to the European Court of Human Rights, in the event of the enactment of British legislation granting amnesty in respect of criminal acts in or relating to the North of Ireland; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an Stát do dhéanamh iarratais chuig an gCúirt Eorpach um Chearta an Duine, i gcás go n-achtófar reachtaíocht de chuid na Breataine lena ndéanfar ilphardún a dheonú i leith gníomhartha coiriúla i dTuaisceart Éireann nó i ndáil le Tuaisceart Éireann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: European Convention on Human Rights (Challenge to British Government Amnesty) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fán gCoinbhinsiún Eorpach um Chearta an Duine (Agóid i gCoinne Ilphardún Rialtas na Breataine), 2023

debates.showAs: Commission of Investigation (Collusion of British State Forces) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a public inquiry into collusion between British State forces and other persons, between 1968 and 1998, to commit, assist, or prevent prosecution of, offences, including murder, in the island of Ireland.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fiosrúchán poiblí ar chlaonpháirteachas idir fórsaí Stáit na Breataine agus daoine eile, idir 1968 agus 1998, chun cionta, lena n-áirítear dúnmharú, a dhéanamh nó chun cuidiú lena ndéanamh, nó chun ionchúiseamh cionta, lena n-áirítear dúnmharú, a chosc, ar oileán na hÉireann.
bill.shortTitleEn: Commission of Investigation (Collusion of British State Forces) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Choimisiún Imscrúdúcháin (Claonpháirteachas Fhórsaí Stáit na Breataine), 2023

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Public Order) Act 1994 to make specific provision for minimum sentences for certain assault offences; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí), 1994 chun socrú sonrach a dhéanamh maidir le pianbhreitheanna íosta i leith cionta ionsaithe áirithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Commission of Investigation (Nursing Homes) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a public inquiry into the management, in connection with nursing homes, of the risks to human life and health posed by Covid-19; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le fiosrúchán poiblí, i dtaca le tithe banaltrais, maidir leis an mbaol don bheatha dhaonna agus don tsláinte ó Covid-19 a bhainistiú agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Choimisiún Imscrúdúcháin (Tithe Banaltrais), 2022

debates.showAs: Maternity Care (Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure that mothers receiving maternity care may be accompanied in hospital during childbirth and on occasions prior and subsequent to the birth; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chinntiú go bhféadfaidh máithreacha a bheidh ag fáil cúram máithreachais duine a bheith ina dteannta san ospidéal le linn luí seoil agus ar ócáidí roimh an mbreith agus dá héis; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chúram Máithreachais (Covid-19), 2021

debates.showAs: North-South Interconnector Review Group Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn:
Bill entitled an Act to establish a review group to examine the route of the electricity interconnection
between the State and Northern Ireland of the project known as the North-South
Interconnector, to define the review group’s terms of reference and to require it to submit a
report to the Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications as regards the
placement of high voltage power cables on the route of the North-South Interconnector in the
State, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú grúpa athbhreithnithe chun bealach an idirnasctha leictreachais idir an Stát agus Tuaisceart Éireann de chuid an tionscadail ar a dtugtar an tIdirnascaire Thuaidh-Theas a scrúdú, do mhíniú théarmaí tagartha an ghrúpa athbhreithnithe agus dá cheangal air tuarascáil a chur faoi bhráid an Aire Comhshaoil, Aeráide agus Cumarsáide maidir le cáblaí cumhachta ardvoltais a chur ar bhealach an Idirnascaire Thuaidh-Theas sa Stát, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ghrúpa Athbhreithnithe an Idirnascaire Thuaidh-Theas, 2021

debates.showAs: Dáil (All-Ireland Representation) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable Members of the Parliament of Britain and the north of Ireland elected in respect of any part of the north of Ireland to sit, pose questions and speak in the Dáil; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú do Chomhaltaí de Pharlaimint na Breataine agus Thuaisceart Éireann arna dtoghadh i leith aon chuid de Thuaisceart Éireann suí, ceisteanna a chur agus labhairt sa Dáil; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Dáil (Ionadaíocht Uile-Éireann), 2021

debates.showAs: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021: Second Stage (Resumed)
Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for pain relief for the foetus in certain cases of termination of pregnancy; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le faoiseamh ó phian a thabhairt don fhéatas i gcásanna áirithe ina ndéantar toircheas a fhoirceannadh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Regulation of Termination of Pregnancy) (Foetal Pain Relief) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Foirceannadh Toirchis a Rialáil) (Faoiseamh ó Phian d’Fhéatas), 2021

debates.showAs: Dog Breeding Establishments (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Dog Breeding Establishments (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enhance the welfare of dogs by strengthening the regulation of dog breeding establishments; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun cur le leas madraí trí rialáil bunachas pórúcháin madraí a neartú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bunachais Pórúcháin Madraí (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Road Traffic (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn:
Bill entitled an Act to amend the Road Traffic Act 1961 to provide for dual language road signs and
related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le síneacha bóthair dhá theanga agus nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Hospital Parking Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Hospital Parking Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for parking free of charge for persons attending out-patient services in public hospitals; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le locadh saor in aisce do dhaoine a bheidh ag freastal ar sheirbhísí d’othair sheachtracha in ospidéil phoiblí; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Locadh ag Ospidéil, 2021

debates.showAs: Civil Liability and Courts (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Civil Liability and Courts (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Civil Liability and Courts Act 2004 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Dhliteanas Sibhialta agus Cúirteanna, 2004 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhliteanas Sibhialta agus Cúirteanna (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Oireachtas Members (Economic Justice) (Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide, in the interest of public solidarity, for the reduction of salaries of Oireachtas members during the currency of certain restrictions implemented in connection with Covid-19; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú, ar mhaithe leis an dlúthpháirtíocht phoiblí, maidir le tuarastail chomhaltaí an Oireachtais a laghdú le linn srianta áirithe a bheith i réim arna gcur i ngníomh i dtaca le Covid-19; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhaltaí an Oireachtais (Ceartas Eacnamaíoch) (Covid-19), 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) (Pets) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) (Pets) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) Act 2001 to make specific provision for sentencing for certain offences in relation to pets; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Cionta Gadaíochta agus Calaoise), 2001 chun socrú sonrach a dhéanamh maidir le gearradh pianbhreitheanna i leith cionta áirithe i ndáil le peataí; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) (Pets) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Cionta Gadaíochta agus Calaoise) (Leasú) (Peataí), 2021

debates.showAs: Protection of Children (Online Pornographic Material) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Protection of Children (Online Pornographic Material) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to protect children from viewing pornographic material on the internet; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun leanaí a chosaint ar ábhar pornagrafach ar an idirlíon a bhreathnú; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Children (Online Pornographic Material) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Leanaí (Ábhar Pornagrafach ar Líne), 2020

debates.showAs: Housing (Temporary Provisions regarding Short-term Lettings) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to temporarily suspend the provision of short-term lettings in certain cases, with the objective of increasing the number of dwellings available for rent; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh soláthar na ligean gearrthéarma a fhionraí go sealadach i gcásanna áirithe, arb é an cuspóir atá leis méadú a dhéanamh ar an líon teaghaisí a bheidh ar fáil lena gcur ar cíos; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Housing (Temporary Provisions regarding Short-term Lettings) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na dTithe (Forálacha Sealadacha maidir le Ligin Ghearrthéarma), 2020

debates.showAs: Equitable Beef Pricing Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed)
Equitable Beef Pricing Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Equitable Beef Pricing Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure the provision of an equitable price for beef to farmers operating in that sector in order to ensure that it is a sustainable means for them to earn a livelihood; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chinntiú go soláthrófar praghas cothromasach ar mhairteoil d’fheirmeoirí atá ag oibriú san earnáil sin d’fhonn a chinntiú gur modh inchothaithe dóibh é chun slí bheatha a thuilleamh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Praghsáil Chothromasach ar Mhairteoil, 2020

debates.showAs: Ministers and Ministers of State (Successors) Bill 2020: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Ministers and Ministers of State (Successors) Bill 2020: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ministers and Ministers of State (Successors) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure the prompt appointment of successors to Ministers and Ministers of State who have as a result of a general election ceased to be members of the Oireachtas; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chinntiú go gceapfar comharbaí go pras ar Airí agus ar Airí Stáit atá, mar thoradh ar olltoghchán, scortha de bheith ina gcomhaltaí den Oireachtas; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Ministers and Ministers of State (Successors) Bill 2020
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Airí agus Airí Stáit (Comharbaí), 2020

debates.showAs: Equitable Beef Pricing Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure the provision of an equitable price for beef to farmers operating in that sector in order to ensure that it is a sustainable means for them to earn a livelihood; to abolish the 30 month rule concerning cattle; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chinntiú go soláthrófar praghas cothromasach ar mhairteoil d’fheirmeoirí atá ag oibriú san earnáil sin d’fhonn a chinntiú gur modh inchothaithe dóibh é chun slí bheatha a thuilleamh; do chur deireadh leis an riail 30 mí a bhaineann le heallach; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Praghsáil Chothromasach ar Mhairteoil, 2019

debates.showAs: Údarás na Gaeltachta (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for democratic elections to Údarás na Gaeltachta and for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa:
Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toghcháin dhaonlathacha 
chun Údarás na Gaeltachta agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Údarás na Gaeltachta (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: National Monuments (The Moore Street Battlefield) Bill 2018: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
National Monuments (The Moore Street Battlefield) Bill 2018: Second Stage [Private Members]
National Monuments (The Moore Street Battlefield) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the National Monuments Acts 1930 to 2014 for the purpose of deeming certain parts of Moore Street, and its environs, in the City of Dublin to be a national monument for the purposes of those Acts; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Achtanna na Séadchomharthaí Náisiúnta, 1930 go 2014 chun a mheas gur séadchomhartha náisiúnta chun críocha na nAchtanna sin codanna áirithe de Shráid an Mhúraigh, agus dá purláin, i gCathair Bhaile Átha Cliath; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: National Monuments (The Moore Street Battlefield) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na Séadchomharthaí Náisiúnta (Machaire Catha Shráid an Mhúraigh), 2018

debates.showAs: Arts (Dignity at Work) (Amendment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the Arts Council to ensure that funding is contingent on compliance with employment law and for that purpose to amend the Arts Act 2003; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chumasú don Chomhairle Ealaíon a chinntiú go mbeidh maoiniú ag brath ar an dlí fostaíochta a bheith á chomhlíonadh agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Ealaíon, 2003; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Ealaíon (Dínit ag an Obair) (Leasú), 2018

debates.showAs: Famine Memorial Day Bill 2016: Second Stage
Famine Memorial Day Bill 2016: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Famine Memorial Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the holding of Famine Memorial Day on the same day each year and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le Lá Cuimhneacháin an Ghorta Mhóir a sheoladh ar an lá céanna gach bliain agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Lá Cuimhneacháin an Ghorta Mhóir, 2016

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: Céim an Choiste

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Housing, Planning and Local Government

debates.showAs: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: Second Stage [Private Members]
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016 [Private Members]: Referral to Select Committee
An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2) 2016: An Chéad Chéim
Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Constitution
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an Bunreacht a leasú
bill.shortTitleEn: Thirty-fifth Amendment of the Constitution (Water in Public Ownership) (No. 2) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an gCúigiú Leasú is Tríocha ar an mBunreacht (Uisce faoi Úinéireacht Phoiblí) (Uimh. 2), 2016

debates.showAs: North-South Interconnector Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the North – South interconnector providing regulations for erection adjacent to dwellings and public places, re-routing of disputed interconnector parts underground following opposition during public consultations and related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an t-idirnascaire Thuaidh-Theas a rialáil trí rialacháin a sholáthar maidir le tógáil tadhlach le teaghaisí agus le háiteanna poiblí, maidir le codanna idirnascaire a ndearnadh díospóid ina leith a atreorú faoi thalamh tar éis don phobal cur ina gcoinne le linn comhchomhairliúcháin phoiblí agus maidir le nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Idirnascaire Thuaidh-Theas, 2016

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Blacklists) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make it unlawful to compile, use, sell or supply blacklists containing details of people who are, or have been, trade union members or who are taking part, or have taken part, in trade union activities or an industrial action where such blacklists may be used by employers to discriminate in relation to recruitment or the treatment of existing workers and provide for sanctions where such unlawful actions as detailed occur.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun tiomsú, úsáid, díol nó soláthar dúliostaí a dhéanamh neamhdhleathach, is dúliostaí ina bhfuil mionsonraí daoine atá, nó a bhí, ina gcomhaltaí ceardchumainn nó a bhfuil páirt á glacadh acu, nó a ghlac páirt, i ngníomhaíochtaí ceardchumainn nó i ngníomh tionscail i gcás go bhféadfadh fostóirí dúliostaí den sórt sin a úsáid chun idirdhealú a dhéanamh i ndáil le hearcaíocht nó i ndáil le déileáil le hoibrithe láithreacha agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le smachtbhannaí i gcás go dtarlaíonn gníomhartha neamhdhleathacha den sórt sin arna mionsonrú.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Dúliostaí), 2015

debates.showAs: Banded Hours Contract Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for banded hour contracts, the right for a worker to request increased hours and a corresponding obligation on an employer to consider such a request, to permit refusal only on objectively justified grounds and an obligation on employers to provide information to workers on the overall working hours available in the employment
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le conarthaí uaireanta bandáilte, maidir le ceart oibrí chun uaireanta méadaithe a iarraidh agus maidir le hoibleagáid chomhfhreagrach a bheith ar fhostóir iarraidh den sórt sin a bhreithniú, do cheadú diúltú ar fhorais is inchosanta go hoibiachtúil, agus sa chás sin amháin, agus maidir le hoibleagáid a bheith ar fhostóirí faisnéis a sholáthar d'oibrithe i dtaobh an lín fhoriomláin uaireanta oibre atá ar fáil san fhostaíocht
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chonarthaí Uaireanta Bandáilte, 2015

debates.showAs: Parental Leave (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for paid bereavement leave
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le saoire mhéala le pá
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shaoire do Thuismitheoirí (Leasú), 2015

debates.showAs: Road Traffic (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Road Traffic Act 1961 to provide for dual language road signs and related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le síneacha bóthair dhá theanga agus nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2015

debates.showAs: Companies (Amendment) Bill 2015: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Companies Act 2014 to hold a company officer or officers acting on behalf of a corporate body personally liable where a breach of employment law is committed
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú Acht na gCuideachtaí, 2014 chun go mbreithneofar oifigeach cuideachta nó oifigigh chuideachta a bheidh ag gníomhú thar ceann comhlacht corpraithe a bheith faoi dhliteanas go pearsanta i gcás go ndéanfar sárú ar an dlí fostaíochta
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na gCuideachtaí (Leasú), 2015

debates.showAs: Protection of Employees (Amendment) Bill 2012: Second Stage (Resumed)
Protection of Employees (Amendment) Bill 2012: Second Stage
Protection of Employees (Amendment) Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for extensions to the periods of notice required to be given in collective redundancies, to provide a time limit within which applications for redress for employees must be heard, to confer certain rights on employees where employers fail to pay debts due, to provide a time limit within which applications for redress must be processed and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le faduithe ar na tréimhsí fógra is gá a thabhairt i dtaca le comhiomarcaíochtaí, do shocrú teorainn ama ar laistigh di a chaithfear iarratais ar shásamh d'fhostaithe a éisteacht, do thabhairt cearta áirithe d'fhostaithe i gcás ina mainníonn fostóirí fiacha atá dlite a íoc, do shocrú teorainn ama ar laistigh di a chaithfear iarratais ar shásamh a phróiseáil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Fostaithe (Leasú), 2012

debates.showAs: Financial Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Reviews of Commercial Rents) Bill 2012: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: , in the public interest, to provide for the imposition by way of Government Order of a requirement that landlords charge market rents only in respect of commercial premises, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: , ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le ceanglas a fhorchur le hOrdú Rialtais nach ndéanfaidh tiarnaí talún ach margadh-chíosanna amháin a mhuirearú i leith áitreabh tráchtála, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Financial Emergency Measures in the Public Interest (Reviews of Commercial Rents) Bill 2012
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bearta Airgeadais Éigeandála ar mhaithe le Leas an Phobail (Athbhreithnithe ar Chíosanna Tráchtála), 2012

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2011: Second Stage
Industrial Relations (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2011: Referral to Select Committee
Industrial Relations (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2011: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make further and better provision for promoting harmonious relations between workers and employers, to amend and extend the Industrial Relations Acts 1946 to 2004, to amend the Employment Permits Act 2006 and the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú breise agus feabhsaithe chun caidreamh comhchuí a chur chun cinn idir oibrithe agus fostóirí, do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna Caidrimh Thionscail, 1946 go 2004, do leasú an Achta um Cheadanna Fostaíochta, 2006 agus an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997, agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Leasú) (Uimh. 2), 2011
